title: 文宣組：係時候叫美國隊長及其隊友幫手

replies.msg:
立即推俾你嘅美國朋友，一人一信寫比佢哋美國嘅參眾兩會議員，寫到佢哋唔盡快回應都唔得，一定要炸爆佢哋嘅郵箱!
電郵Template已準備好，推，推，推！

Dear friends of Hong Kong,

We, Hongkongers just experienced a terrorist attack planned and executed by our Hong Kong Police Force. At about 10pm today, our police force rushed into our railway system in Prince Edward station, got into the carriage and indifferently beat up everyone in it regardless of whether they are protesters or simply passengers. They ignored the weapon guidelines and fired tear gas indoor in the carriage which is in fact lethal. Also, they beat up innocent people causing them seriously wounded. Some passengers kneeled before them asking them to stop but the response they got were to be beaten even harder. Ironically, the police haven’t arrested the passengers after they got beaten up, showing that the only purpose of their brutality was to sort their anger to violence but not dispersing the crowd.

As Hongkongers are experiencing a humanitarian crisis, I hope you can help us by writing to your House representatives and congressmen/congresswomen to appeal for Hong Kong's humanitarian crisis.

1) Please write to your senators by clicking here: https://www.senate.gov/senators/contact

2) Please write to your house representatives by clicking here: https://www.house.gov/representatives

Please feel free to use the letter template below:

Dear XXX,

(As an American citizen residing in Hong Kong) please be informed that Hong Kongers have just experienced a terrorist attack planned and executed by our Hong Kong Police Force. At about 10pm today, our police force rushed into our railway system in Prince Edward station, got into the carriage and indifferently beat up everyone in it regardless of whether they are protesters or simply passengers. They ignored the weapon guidelines and fired tear gas indoor in the carriage which is in fact lethal. Also, they beat up innocent people causing them seriously wounded. Some passengers kneeled before them asking them to stop but the response they got were to be beaten even harder. Ironically, the police haven’t arrested the passengers after they got beaten up, showing that the only purpose of their brutality was to sort their anger to violence but not dispersing the crowd.

As Hongkongers are experiencing a humanitarian crisis, I hope you can help by pressing against the Chinese and Hong Kong government to stop their violence against the people of Hong Kong and apply punitive measures against any government officials who are responsible for these acts of violence. Please also help to lobby other congressmen and congresswomen to pass the Hong Kong Human Rights and Democracy Act when Congress resume.

Thank you very much for your kind attention and I hope you will stand with the people of Hong Kong in their fight for democracy and justice!

XXX
8/31//2019
